title: Start
body:
<<clearPortrait Steve>>
<<changeTrustValue Xander increase>>
<<changeTrustValue Dana increase>>
<<changeTrustValue Steve decrease>>

<<if $visited_start_before is true>>
Steve, D--... Hey, you've been here before
[[Sure have! Next, pls!|NextNode]]
<<else>>
Steve, Dana and Xander, oh my!
<<set $visited_start_before to true>>
[[Next, pls!|NextNode]]
<<endif>>

title: NextNode
body:
<<changeTrustValue Xander decrease>>
<<changeTrustValue Dana decrease>>
<<changeTrustValue Steve increase>>

<<activateNeutralPortrait Steve>>


Boyhowdy, what a sudden reversal!
[[Wow, it sure was!|WowYes]]
[[Pff, I saw it coming...|WowNo]]

title: WowYes
body:
<<activateHappyPortrait Steve>>
Right? It's crazy!
[[Let's do it again!|Start]]

title: WowNo
body:
<<clearPortrait Steve>>
Well, alright then, Mr. Know-it-all. 

[[(Restart)|Start]]
